links.*: Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode

wikitext.*:
[[Image:Silme nuquerna.gif|left]]'''''Silmë Nuquerna''''' is the name in [[Quenya]] of the thirtieth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref>{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>  In form it is an inversion of the twenty-ninth letter ([[Silmë]]).  It is mostly used as a variation, especially in modes employing superimposed ''[[tehtar]]'',<ref>{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref> and it represents '''S'''.   However, in the [[Mode of Beleriand]], as seen as in the inscription on the [[Doors of Durin|West-gate]] of [[Moria]],<ref>{{FR|II4}}</ref> ''Silmë Nuquerna'' represents vocalic '''Y'''.<ref>{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The vowels''</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Ós'''''.<ref>See ''[[Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode]]''</ref>
